mapper.select: select DISTINCT mp_artist from mplan_music where mp_artist like concat('%',concat(UPPER(#{search}), '%')) or mp_artist like concat('%', concat(LOWER(#{search}), '%'))

SELECT mp_artist AS art_artist, mp_artistorg AS art_img, mp_debut AS art_debut, mp_favorite_artist AS art_hit, mp_etc AS art_etc, mp_label AS art_label FROM mplan_artist WHERE mp_artist LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(UPPER(#{search}),'%')) OR mp_artist LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(LOWER(#{search}),'%')) OR mp_artist LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{search}),'%') AND mp_useyn = 'Y'

SELECT mp_artist AS al_artist, mp_album AS al_album, mp_year AS al_year, mp_albumimgorg AS al_imgorg, mp_corp as al_corp FROM mplan_album WHERE mp_artist LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(UPPER(#{search}),'%')) OR mp_artist LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(LOWER(#{search}),'%')) OR mp_artist LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{search}),'%') OR mp_album LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(UPPER(#{search}),'%')) OR mp_album LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(LOWER(#{search}),'%')) OR mp_album LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{search}),'%') AND mp_useyn = 'Y';

SELECT mp_artist AS m_artist, mp_title AS m_title, mp_album AS m_album, mp_year AS m_year, mp_imgo AS m_imgo, mp_320ko AS m_320ko, mp_192ko AS m_192ko FROM mplan_music WHERE mp_artist LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(UPPER(#{search}),'%')) OR mp_artist LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(LOWER(#{search}),'%')) OR mp_artist LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{search}),'%') OR mp_album LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(UPPER(#{search}),'%')) OR mp_album LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(LOWER(#{search}),'%')) OR mp_album LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{search}),'%') OR mp_title LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(UPPER(#{search}),'%')) OR mp_title LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(LOWER(#{search}),'%')) OR mp_title LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{search}),'%') AND mp_useyn = 'Y';
select count(*) from mplan_music where mp_insert_date > CURDATE()
